text: The Miss Perú 1970 pageant was held on June 12, 1970. That year, 24 candidates were competing for the national crown. The chosen winner represented Peru at the Miss Universe 1970.http://www.pageantopolis.com/universe-lists-p-to-z.html The rest of the finalists would enter in different pageants.http://www.caretas.com.pe/Main.asp?T=3082&idE;=874&idA;=45849#.VAHAs8VdXSE ==Placements== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !width="220" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Final Results !width="300" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Contestant |- | Miss Peru Universe 1970 | *22px Arequipa – Cristina Málaga Butrón |- | 1st Runner-Up | * Cuzco - Pocha Cárdenas |- | 2nd Runner-Up | * 22px Amazonas - María Arias |- | Top 6 | * 22px Ayacucho - Gloria Rivera Bedoya * 22px Pasco - Ana María Landazuri * 22px Puno - Maricarmen Velando |- | Top 10 | * 22px San Martín - Rosa Barragán * 22px Moquegua - Martha de la Jara * 22px Ancash - María Inés Malpica * 22px Loreto - Cunny Ferreyros |} ==Special Awards== * Best Regional Costume - Lambayeque - Olivia Avalos * Miss Photogenic -
